channel.title: bio on prateek grover
channel.description: Recent content in bio on prateek grover

item.description:
work


Hi, I’m Prateek Grover.

I’m a graduate student at KU Leuven, Belgium majoring in Computer Science.

I have experience in developing backend systems for large scale software platforms and ML research across multiple labs, with a focus on computer vision.

Currently, I’m working at Atlas Copco Group in Antwerp, Belgium as a Site Reliability Engineer co-op.

prateek.grover.in[at]gmail[dot]com | LinkedIn | GitHub
